doc:
Willie Garson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Willie_Garson 0 William Garson Paszamant (born February 20, 1964) is an American actor. He has appeared in over 75 films, and more than 300 TV episodes. He is known for playing Stanford Blatch on the HBO series Sex and the City and in the related films Sex and the City and Sex and the City 2, and for his role as Mozzie, in the USA Network series White Collar from 2009 to 2014. He appears on Hawaii Five-0 as Gerard Hirsch. William_Garson_Paszamant ( born February_20_,_1964 ) is an_American_actor . He has_appeared in over_75_films , and more_than_300_TV_episodes . He is_known for playing Stanford_Blatch on the_HBO_series_Sex and the_City and in the_related_films_Sex and the_City and Sex and the_City_2 , and for his_role as Mozzie , in the_USA_Network_series_White_Collar from 2009 to 2014 . He appears on Hawaii_Five-0 as Gerard_Hirsch .
